name: Speech Naturalness (MOS)
description: Mean Opinion Score evaluation focused on speech naturalness and human-likeness.

metrics.name: mos_naturalness
metrics.definition: Mean Opinion Score for naturalness (1-5 scale)

metrics.name: human_likeness
metrics.definition: Percentage of samples rated as human-like

test_method: Human listeners rate speech naturalness on 1-5 scale. Compare synthetic speech against human baseline. Minimum 20 listeners per sample.
notes: Naturalness evaluation is subjective and varies by listener background. Should use native speakers and control for listener demographics.
